Method Summary
 void finishRecording()
          close the stream that our data is being sent to, then convert the array we've been caching to in RAM to a wave file after it's done writing PCM to the disk.
 void receiveAudio(java.nio.ByteBuffer audioInfo)
          Our data comes in big-endian, but we need to write 16-bit PCM in little-endian, so we'll loop through the buffer, reversing bytes as we spit out to the our data output stream.

Method Detail

receiveAudio

public void receiveAudio(java.nio.ByteBuffer audioInfo)
Our data comes in big-endian, but we need to write 16-bit PCM in little-endian, so we'll loop through the buffer, reversing bytes as we spit out to the our data output stream.

Specified by:
receiveAudio in interface ReceivesAudio

finishRecording

public void finishRecording()
close the stream that our data is being sent to, then convert the array we've been caching to in RAM to a wave file after it's done writing PCM to the disk.
